# Show

## Import

```jsx
import { Show } from 'fannypack';
```

## Usage

The `<Show>` component can be used to show elements on the screen above or below a particular breakpoint, but **hide them otherwise**.

```jsx-live
<Show below="desktop">
  This should show on viewports below desktop.
</Show>
<Show above="desktop">
  This should show on viewports above or equal to desktop.
</Show>
```
